page.title: 07KIRKCOWAN CHURCH
page.content: In the past there have been 3 churches but today only 1 is used,while 1 is a ruin and the other is used as a workshop.In{1658}the original church was built but was replaced by the present building in{1834.}Because there was a shortage of ministers,in{ {1982}Kirkcowan church was{linked with {Wigtown}8.7mls away.The manse in the village was sold and used as a Guest House,while the minister now lives in Wigtown.Only 1 service is held on Sundays.About 20 children attend{ {Sunday School}which meets first in the church and then in the school,across the road.Once a month about 15 members of the{Women's Guild}meet in the Church Vestry.They have speakers who demonstrate crafts and explain the work of the church.They also raise money to keep up the church.
